channel.title: Breakfast on John L. Godlee
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on John L. Godlee

item.title: Chilaquiles
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 avocado, sliced
  • 6 eggs
  • 0.5 cup crumbled feta
  • 1.5 cup tortilla chips
  • 2.5 cups tomato salsa
  • 1 lime
  • 3 sprigs cilantro
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

Method

  1. heat oil in pan
  2. Add salsa to pan and simmer for 10 minutes
  3. Add chips, and stir into salsa
  4. Add feta
  5. Crack eggs around edge of pan
  6. Cover pan and let sit for 10 minutes or until eggs have set
  7. Serve with a spatula, with lime juice, extra feta, avocado, coriander

item.title: Freezer breakfast burritos
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 12 eggs
  • 10 wheat tortillas
  • 1 435 g tin refried beans
  • 250 g mushrooms
  • 30 g fresh coriander
  • 120 g mild cheddar cheese
  • 1 green chilli
  • 5 spring onions
  • Hot sauce
  • Salsa
  • Butter or vegetable oil
  • Greaseproof paper

Optionally:

  • Spinach
  • Fried bell peppers
  • Cooked green lentils
  • Shredded cooked chicken
  • Queso fresco

Method

  1. Finely dice the mushrooms
  2. In a large frying pan, fry the mushrooms in butter or vegetable oil until most of the water has burned off, then decant into a bowl
  3. Beat the eggs and scramble in the pan until quite dry, leave to cool
  4. Finely chop the coriander, grate the cheese, de-seed and finely slice the green chilli, finely slice the spring onions, decant the refried beans into a bowl
  5. Smear the centre of a tortilla with refried beans, then add eggs, mushrooms, cheese, green chilli, spring onions, coriander, salsa and hot sauce
  6. Roll up the tortilla then wrap in greaseproof paper and freeze
  • To reheat, microwave at 800w for ~4 minutes

item.title: Overnight oats
item.description:
To make one serving.

Ingredients

  • 50 g porridge oats
  • 2 tbsp yogurt
  • 100 ml milk, or equivalent milk powder and water
  • 1 tsp honey
  • 50 g mixed berries
  • 0.5 tbsp nut butter

Extras

  • Chia seeds
  • Vanilla
  • Cream
  • Cinnamon
  • Nutmeg
  • Chopped nuts
  • Dried fruit
  • Fresh berries
  • Sliced apple
  • Sliced banana
  • Jam
  • Lemon zest
  • Chocolate chips

Method

  1. Mix all the dry ingredients
  2. Add the wet ingredients and mix thoroughly
  3. Keep overnight in the fridge in a container with a lid

item.title: Porridge
item.description:
To make one serving.

Ingredients

  • 50 g porridge oats
  • 20 g milk powder
  • 200 ml water

Method

  1. In a saucepan, mix oats and milk powder
  2. Add water and mix thoroughly
  3. Heat to boiling, then reduce heat and simmer, stirring to avoid oats sticking to bottom of pan
  4. Serve with:
    • Peanut butter
    • Raisins
    • Honey
    • Muesli
    • Nuts
    • Cocoa powder
    • CInnamon and brown sugar
